items.name: Riding Crop
items.description: A well-worn riding crop.  You always carry it with you on an investigation.

items.name: Violin
items.roomDescription: A {name} rests on a stool in the corner

conversation.statement: Truth be told, Holmes, I believe you're wasting your time.  The culprit obviously suffers from some form of monomania and wishes to smash every image of Napoleon that he can find.  It's quite simple, really.

questions.text: Can you tell me the principal facts again?

answer.statement: Certainly.  There's a rather daft chap who has been smashing busts of Napoleon.  He's been to three places already.

rooms.description: You are in the sitting room of your flat at 421B Baker St.  It is a modest, comfortable room with several armchairs and a blazing fire.  {violin}

checkpoints.watson: Nothing for it but to start asking around.

cutscenes.description: Watson, Lestrade, and Holmes are sitting at Baker St.  They talk about the Six Napoleons, Holmes decides to investigate.
You pick up the violin and play a slow mournful tune as you contemplate your investigation.  After a few minutes, you finish the tune and place the violin back on its stool.
